name: TENTACIÓN
description:
This game belongs to the Final Degree Project "Devising the ludoclip: a video ludic approach to the cinematography and rhythm of the music video", which focuses on the exploration of the commercial, artistic and ludic possibilities of the interactive music video, as well as on the limits of the application of video game development methodologies to the cinematographic field and vice versa.

For this purpose, and according to specific rules and needs, the work conceives a new type of audiovisual work, halfway between the video clip and the music video, which is studied as an additional, complementary, or substitute part of the audiovisual medium, and specifically of its effective and satisfactory implementation in a universal, volatile, and "McDonalized" context such as that of the music industry.
